headline.main: THE PRESS CONFERENCE EVOLVES AS REAL ISSUE; Congress Wonders if Things Are Amiss And Takes a Look for Itself

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 1 -- Congress has turned the spotlight on one of Washington's unique and colorful institutions -- the press conference.
abstract: E Davis holds press conf before Sen Judiciary Com
